title: Adaptive Physical Activity Programs – Guided Video Tutorials for Safe Home Exercises
summary: As a retired social worker, I want guided video tutorials for safe home exercises tailored to my abilities so that I can remain physically active without risking injury due to my arthritis and reduced mobility.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Activities – Memory Recall Challenges Based on Personal History
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to engage in memory recall challenges based on my personal history so that I can stay mentally active and connected to my past experiences while managing my arthritis and limited mobility.

title: Wellness Check-In Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want interactive voice check-ins to assess my mental state so that I can remain mentally active and receive timely support when needed.

title: Guided Mindfulness and Relaxation Exercises
summary: As an older adult, I want daily reminders for guided mindfulness and relaxation exercises with calming sounds so that I can manage my arthritis pain and remain mentally active while staying socially connected.

title: Community Activity Engagement – Local Event Notifications Based on User Interests
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive notifications about local events that align with my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue volunteering despite my limited mobility.

title: Personalized Learning Modules – Music or Art Appreciation Classes
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to access personalized music or art appreciation classes so that I can remain mentally engaged and continue my passion for community activities while managing my reduced mobility.
